document_data.caption: A map showing Fire Way in southwest Zhentil Keep.
document_data.name: Fire Way
document_data.ends: The wall of the [[Zhentil Keep/Harbor District|Harbor District]]
document_data.mainbody: '''Fire Way''' was a small road located in the city of [[Zhentil Keep]] during the midâ€“14{{th}} century [[DR]].
document_data.Location: Fire Way was located in the southwest corner of Zhentil Keep in the [[Zhentil Keep/Common Quarter|Common Quarter]]. The road ran west to east, beginning near the [[Tower of Pain Exalted]] in the west and passing east to end at the wall of the [[Zhentil Keep/Harbor District|Harbor District]]. Fire Way connected with [[Brigand Way]].
